name: Jumper Cars
description:
Jumper cars is a fast-paced local 2player 1v1 deathmatch to see who can push the other out of the arena first. Jump over your opponent, or ram their wheels and sides to throw them off their game and mess with their balance. The game has both a Top-Down and a Third-Person option. 

CONTROLS P1: Move  "WASD"   Jump "T"   Flip car back when on the roof "Y"

CONTROLS P2: Move  "Arrowkeys"   Jump "7"   Flip car back when on the roof "8"

The game currently has a lot of bugs. If anything doesn't look right press SPACEBAR to reset the level and it should fix itself. Sounds are missing as well, but they will be added!
